roleset.name: (cause to) become dizzy
roleset.note: DIZZY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dizzy' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from dizzy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: dizzy-v: all args
example.text: John-1 was dizzied *trace*-1 by Mary's rapid switches between loving tenderness and brutal violence.
example.arg: by Mary's rapid switches between loving tenderness and brutal violence

example.name: dizzying-j
example.text: Western European leaders who favor speedy economic and monetary union are adding a new argument to their arsenal: the dizzying political changes under way in Eastern Europe.

roleset.name: feel a disorienting spinning sensation
roleset.note: DIZZY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on (from dizzy.01-j)

example.text: Finally, though, he stayed inside until his face was flushed bright red and he was dizzy from the heat.
